ATLANTA (AP) Allergy season can be miserable for tens of millions of Americans when trees, grass, and other pollens cause runny noses, itchy eyes, coughing and sneezing.

articles.title: Warren Buffett and Jamie Dimon want billionaires to pay their fair share to Uncle Sam. But a ‘millionaires tax’ would likely affect all the wrong people - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: America’s wealthiest individuals earn much more from capital gains and dividends than wages or salaries.
articles.content: Americas most celebrated investor and the head of Wall Streets most powerful bank have had a clear message for Washington: Tax us more.  Warren Buffett and Jamie Dimon, the CEOs of Berkshire Hathaway… [+4162 chars]
